subtitle: Light, creamy old-fashioned pud ideally made from the finest English strawberries.

method.text: Place wine, lemon rind, juice and sugar in a bowl. Leave to stand for 1 hour.
Add cream and whisk until mixture holds its shape. Make sure you do not over whip the mixture or it may curdle.
Place strawberries in a blender and process until smooth. Gently fold into the syllabub until well mixed. Spoon into the chilled serving dishes and chill for 1 hour.
To serve: decorate each syllabub with a strawberry and a, sprig of fresh mint.

title: Simply strawberry syllabub
